org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc.message

Class MessageChannelReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc.message.MessageChannelReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageReader

    public class MessageChannelReader
extends Object
implements MessageReader
    Reads a sequence of messages using a ReadChannel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Construct from an existing ReadChannel.

                        throws IOException
        Read the next message from the ReadChannel.
